settings.title: Zipato Device Settings
settings.description: On this page you see the settings for the Zipato devices.

descriptions.allowTags: Registration of new tags is allowed
descriptions.denyTags: Registration of new tags is not allowed

messages.confirmClearEventLog: Are you sure you want to clear the entire event log?
messages.confirmDeteleTag: Are you sure you want to remove this tag?
messages.confirmDeteleUser: Are you sure you want to remove this user?
messages.noUsersYet: No tagusers known in Homey yet, add a user via the add button.
messages.noEventsYet: No events yet available, add a Tag Reader and tags to your Homey to start collecting events.
messages.noTagsYet: No tags available, please add tags first.

statusCodes.s4: Unknown Tag. The manual toggle is set to off or your system is in armed status.

condition.userNotFound: Can't find user with given ID.
